title: Postgres server CPU usage exceeds alert threshold
description: The recent CPU load average on the Postgres server is high.

definition.name: [Supabase] Postgres server cpu usage is high
definition.message: The Postgres server for project {{supabase_project_ref.name}} is {{#is_alert}}under high load{{/is_alert}}{{#is_alert_recovery}}back within acceptable load{{/is_alert_recovery}}. @example@example.com
